class.name: AnimationNode
class.description: Base resource for [AnimationTree] nodes. In general it's not used directly but you can create custom ones with custom blending formulas. Inherit this when creating nodes mainly for use in [AnimationNodeBlendTree], otherwise [AnimationRootNode] should be used instead.

method.name: add_input
method.description: Add an input to the node. This is only useful for nodes created for use in an [AnimationNodeBlendTree]

method.name: blend_animation
method.description: Blend an animation by "blend" amount (name must be valid in the linked [AnimationPlayer]). A time and delta mas be passed, as well as whether seek happened.

method.name: blend_input
method.description: Blend an input. This is only useful for nodes created for an [AnimationNodeBlendTree]. Time is a delta, unless "seek" is true, in which case it is absolute. A filter mode may be optionally passed.

method.name: blend_node
method.description: Blend another animaiton node (in case this node contains children animation nodes). This function is only useful if you inherit from [AnimationRootNode] instead, else editors will not display your node for addition.

method.name: get_caption
method.description: Get the text caption for this node (used by some editors)

method.name: get_child_by_name
method.description: Get the a child node by index (used by editors inheriting from [AnimationRootNode]).

method.name: get_child_nodes
method.description: Get all children nodes, in order as a name:node dictionary. Only useful when inheriting [AnimationRootNode].

method.name: get_input_count
method.description: Amount of inputs in this node, only useful for nodes that go into [AnimationNodeBlendTree].

method.name: get_input_name
method.description: Get the name of an input by index.

method.name: get_parameter
method.description: Get the value of a parameter. Parameters are custom local memory used for your nodes, given a resource can be reused in multiple trees.

method.name: get_parameter_default_value
method.description: Get the default value of a parameter. Parameters are custom local memory used for your nodes, given a resource can be reused in multiple trees.

method.name: get_parameter_list
method.description: Get the property information for parameter. Parameters are custom local memory used for your nodes, given a resource can be reused in multiple trees. Format is similar to [method Object.get_property_list].

method.name: has_filter
method.description: Return true whether you want the blend tree editor to display filter editing on this node.

method.name: is_path_filtered
method.description: Return true wether a given path is filtered.

method.name: process
method.description: Called when a custom node is processed. The argument "time" is relative, unless "seek" is true (in which case it is absolute). Here, call the [method blend_input], [method blend_node] or [method blend_animation] functions. You can also use [method get_parameter] and [method set_parameter] to modify local memory. This function returns the time left for the current animation to finish (if unsure, just pass the value from the main blend being called).

method.name: remove_input
method.description: Remove an input, call this only when inactive.

method.name: set_filter_path
method.description: Add/Remove a path for the filter.

method.name: set_parameter
method.description: Set a custom parameter. These are used as local storage, because resources can be reused across the tree or scenes.

signal.name: removed_from_graph
signal.description: Called when the node was removed from the graph.
